sqlMap.insert: insert into DC_GPS_REAL (TMN_CODE, TMN_ALIAS, REPORT_TIME, LOGIT, LAT, LOGIT_OFFSET, LAT_OFFSET, SPEED, ANGLE, HEIGHT, STTS1, STTS2, STTS3, STTS4, ALARM_STTS, ALARM_MARK, GSM_SIGN, GPS_SATL, MONI1, MONI2, MILE, LOC_DESC, ZCODE, GPS_TYPE, ALARM_TYPE,PRECISION,CURR_MILE,SERVER_TIME, IS_VALID_GPS) values (#tmnCode:VARCHAR#, #tmnAlias:VARCHAR#, #gpsTime:DECIMAL#, #lon:DECIMAL#, #lat:DECIMAL#, #lonOffset:DECIMAL#, #latOffset:DECIMAL#, #speed:VARCHAR#, #dire:VARCHAR#, #height:VARCHAR#, #stts1:VARCHAR#, #stts2:VARCHAR#, #stts3:VARCHAR#, #stts4:VARCHAR#, #alarmStts:VARCHAR#, #alarmMark:VARCHAR#, #gsmValue:VARCHAR#, #satlCount:VARCHAR#, #analog0:DECIMAL#, #analog1:DECIMAL#, #mile:DECIMAL#, #locDesc:VARCHAR#, #zCode:VARCHAR#, #gpsType:VARCHAR#, #alarmType:VARCHAR#,#precision:VARCHAR#,#currMile:DECIMAL#,#serverTime:DECIMAL#, #isValidGps:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update DC_GPS_REAL set TMN_ALIAS = #tmnAlias:VARCHAR#, REPORT_TIME = #gpsTime:DECIMAL#, LOGIT = #lon:DECIMAL#, LAT = #lat:DECIMAL#, LOGIT_OFFSET = #lonOffset:DECIMAL#, LAT_OFFSET = #latOffset:DECIMAL#, SPEED = #speed:VARCHAR#, ANGLE = #dire:VARCHAR#, HEIGHT = #height:VARCHAR#, STTS1 = #stts1:VARCHAR#, STTS2 = #stts2:VARCHAR#, STTS3 = #stts3:VARCHAR#, STTS4 = #stts4:VARCHAR#, ALARM_STTS = #alarmStts:VARCHAR#, ALARM_MARK = #alarmMark:VARCHAR#, GSM_SIGN = #gsmValue:VARCHAR#, GPS_SATL = #satlCount:VARCHAR#, MONI1 = #analog0:DECIMAL#, MONI2 = #analog1:DECIMAL#, MILE = #mile:DECIMAL#, LOC_DESC = #locDesc:VARCHAR#, ZCODE = #zCode:VARCHAR#, GPS_TYPE = #gpsType:VARCHAR#, ALARM_TYPE = #alarmType:VARCHAR#, PRECISION= #precision:VARCHAR#, CURR_MILE = #currMile:DECIMAL#, SERVER_TIME = #serverTime:DECIMAL#, IS_VALID_GPS = #isValidGps:VARCHAR# where TMN_CODE = #tmnCode:VARCHAR#
